dashboard.label: Cost Governance Dashboard
dashboard.description: Monitor, flag, and enforce policies on scheduled searches - Cost Governance v2.0

div.style: display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 8px 16px; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2); border-radius: 6px;

search.query: | inputlookup governance_audit_log_lookup | sort - timestamp | head 1 | eval display = strftime(timestamp, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") . " - " . action . " by " . performed_by | table display
| inputlookup governance_search_cache.csv | search disabled=0 | stats count

| inputlookup governance_search_cache.csv | search is_suspicious=1 disabled=0 | lookup flagged_searches_lookup search_name as title OUTPUT status as flag_status | where isnull(flag_status) OR flag_status="" | stats count
| inputlookup flagged_searches_lookup | search status="pending" OR status="notified" OR status="disabled" | stats dc(search_name) as count

| inputlookup flagged_searches_lookup | search status="pending" OR status="notified" | dedup search_name | eval days_remaining = round((remediation_deadline - now()) / 86400, 1) | where days_remaining >= 0 AND days_remaining <= 3 | stats count

| inputlookup flagged_searches_lookup | search status="disabled" | dedup search_name | eval days_ago = (now() - flagged_time) / 86400 | where days_ago <= 7 | stats count as disabled_count | eval disabled_count = if(isnull(disabled_count), 0, disabled_count) | table disabled_count
| inputlookup governance_search_cache.csv | stats count by app | fields app

| inputlookup governance_search_cache.csv | search app=$filter_app$ owner=$filter_owner$ | lookup flagged_searches_lookup search_name as title OUTPUT status as flag_status, remediation_deadline, flagged_by, flagged_time, reason as flag_reason | eval governance_status = case( disabled=1, "Disabled", flag_status="disabled", "Disabled by Governance", flag_status="notified", "Pending Remediation", flag_status="pending", "Flagged", flag_status="review", "Pending Review", flag_status="resolved", "OK", is_suspicious=1 AND (isnull(flag_status) OR flag_status=""), "Suspicious", 1=1, "OK") | eval is_flagged_search = if(flag_status="pending" OR flag_status="notified" OR flag_status="disabled", 1, 0) | eval days_remaining = case( governance_status="OK", null(), governance_status="Suspicious", null(), governance_status="Disabled" OR governance_status="Disabled by Governance", null(), flag_status="pending" OR flag_status="flagged", "‚è∏ Awaiting", (flag_status="notified" OR governance_status="Pending Remediation") AND isnotnull(remediation_deadline), round((remediation_deadline - now()) / 86400, 1), 1=1, null() ) | eval is_expiring_soon = if(isnum(days_remaining) AND days_remaining >= 0 AND days_remaining <= 3, 1, 0) | eval is_suspicious_unflagged = if(is_suspicious=1 AND (isnull(flag_status) OR flag_status=""), 1, 0) | eval view_match = case( "$view_filter$"="flagged", is_flagged_search, "$view_filter$"="expiring", is_expiring_soon, "$view_filter$"="suspicious", is_suspicious_unflagged, 1=1, 1) | where view_match=1 | eval status_filter_match = case( "$view_filter$"="flagged", 1, "$view_filter$"="expiring", 1, "$filter_status$"="*", 1, "$filter_status$"="0" AND disabled=0, 1, "$filter_status$"="1" AND disabled=1, 1, 1=1, 0) | where status_filter_match=1 | eval flagged_date = if(isnotnull(flagged_time), strftime(flagged_time, "%Y-%m-%d"), "") | eval deadline_date = if(isnotnull(remediation_deadline), strftime(remediation_deadline, "%Y-%m-%d"), "") | eval sort_priority = case( governance_status="Suspicious", 1, governance_status="Flagged", 2, governance_status="Pending Remediation", 3, governance_status="Pending Review", 4, governance_status="OK", 5, governance_status="Disabled", 6, governance_status="Disabled by Governance", 7, 1=1, 8) | sort sort_priority, - runtime_ratio | eval display_name = title | eval display_reason = coalesce(flag_reason, suspicious_reason, "") | table display_name, governance_status, owner, app, cron_schedule, frequency_label, avg_runtime_display, run_count, runtime_ratio, svc_per_run, monthly_cost, days_remaining, flagged_by, display_reason | rename display_name as "Search Name", governance_status as "Status", owner as "Owner", app as "App", cron_schedule as "Schedule", frequency_label as "Frequency", avg_runtime_display as "Avg Runtime", run_count as "Runs", runtime_ratio as "Runtime %", svc_per_run as "SVC/Run", monthly_cost as "Cost/Mo", days_remaining as "Days Left", flagged_by as "Flagged By", display_reason as "Reason"
